issue.title: [CF 670] Icon with Dogtag unable to trigger animation
issue.body:
^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SDivine~`Insight ^SEnabled^B ^t^N60418^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

This is the icon specifically. I have been unable to get it to work until I deleted the text display. (Using r631)


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #670 | Raw

comments.body:
Upon further testing the association with the dogtag seemed to be only coincidental. It worked when I deleted the tag at first. But after reneabling and redisabling the tag it's not working again.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

I should clarify that I'm trying to trigger an animation by adding this icon as an event trigger to another icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

I need the other icon too, then.

Edited Oct 24, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
